title: Metric - The Police And The Private

lastfm.summary: From Canadian Indie rock group Metric's second album, Live It Out, The Police and the Private offers a deep sense of the power of Emily Haines' rich and retro vocals. Minimalism and meaningful lyrics intertwine to produce a nostalgic sound reminiscent of 1980's New Wave ballads. Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: The Police and the Private
